help:
📖 **Writing Tracker Bot — Commands:**

**General**
• `!help` — Show this help message

**Word Tracking**
• `!words` — Show your current word count for this month
• `!words all` — Show your current and total word count
• `!words <number>` — Set your word count for this month (e.g., `!words 1200`)
• `!words +<number>` — Add to your monthly and total count (e.g., `!words +500`)
• `!words -<number>` — Subtract from your monthly and total count (e.g., `!words -100`)
• `!words leaderboard` — See the top word counts for this month
